workTrackingDesc: Easily record and monitor diamond cutting and polishing work with detailed entries.
paymentManagementDesc: Track all payments with complete history and reporting.
userFriendlyDesc: Simple, intuitive interface designed for industry professionals.
languageChangeInfo: App language will change immediately after selection.
themeChangeInfo: App appearance will change immediately after selection.
rateExperience: Would you like to rate your experience? Your feedback helps us improve!
shareMessage: Check out Checkhira - Your complete diamond business companion! Track work, manage payments, and streamline operations with this intuitive app. Download now:
appDescription: Checkhira helps diamond industry professionals track work, manage payments, and streamline operations with an intuitive mobile app.
phoneNeeded: We'll need your phone number to continue
